default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: My services don't come cheap. Summoning me in such a brusque manner... I take it you've already decided on a destination?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Once you board my caravan, there's no turning back.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Finally... I can take a nice long break...

default.title: Level Up
default.text: For me? Heh, how thoughtful of you.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Someone is getting more brazen by the day.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I suppose I can humor you for a bit.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Don't worry. I've taken care of everything. It's all over now.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: How dare you raid my dock?

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: The end is nigh!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Heh, it's just... the bitter end of reality.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Even "dreams" come with a price tag. People are willing to pay astronomical sums to achieve theirs—those who hesitate are just looking for a better deal.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Whenever our caravan passes through DisCity customs, a beautiful chime rings out. I must let you hear it sometime... It's the sound of dreams shattering against reality.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: For the right price, my caravan can transport anyone to any place in the world. But, whether the client is still breathing upon arrival... well, that's not something I can guarantee.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Don't mourn for the treasures buried in WhiteSands. Désir's ebb and flow is just the nature of these end times. How about we share a laugh and bid them all farewell?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: If you want to be like me—freely roaming WhiteSands, owning a cozy hideaway, and able to enjoy Eastside desserts whenever I please—remember this: people's hearts are your most valuable asset. Hold them close, and don't hesitate to use them.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: It's a shame that I'm enjoying such lovely weather all alone. Why don't you toss aside your work for a bit as well? Let's just sit quietly together without thinking about anything, and watch the crowds come and go...

default.title: Compliance
default.text: If one day the name Vautour Bleu vanishes from WhiteSands, heed my advice: don't go searching for her. She's just flown too long, too far, and needs to rest her wings. Your well-wishes will suffice. Pray for her... to find a nest to call home.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Have you forgotten that I'm a smuggler? Coming to my place so often—aren't you even a little afraid I'll whisk you away someday? Hmm… I wonder how much ransom the MBCC would pay to get you back...

default.title: Idle
default.text: Oh dear, you're daydreaming again... Aren't you worried I might sell you off to the Outlands?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Young people really can't help themselves... Heh, want me to help you?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Let's see what's got our little Chief so wound up, shall we?

default.title: Dispatch Completion
default.text: Oh, silly. Don't tell me you're swayed by such trifling perks?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Didn't get your fill earlier? Come closer then, get a better look.
